pos_mean_info_list.mean: 难过的；悲哀的，令人悲痛的；凄惨的，阴郁的（形容颜色）

bilingual.target: 悲哀地注视着我，我令他们失望了。

bilingual.source: He stared sadly at the ruins of his house.
bilingual.target: 他悲哀地凝视着他那坍塌的房屋。

bilingual.source: Wang Yaner said sadly maming, we divorce .
bilingual.target: 王燕儿悲哀地说马鸣，咱们离婚吧 。

bilingual.source: The Dwarfs are on their knees beside Snow White, crying sadly.
bilingual.target: 小矮人们悲哀地跪在白雪身前，哭得伤心极了。

bilingual.source: Peng also know the Sue ofs death, she attended the funeral sadly.
bilingual.target: 彭也知道了苏达的死讯，她悲哀地参加了葬礼。

bilingual.source: Sadly there is often some of the feelings of Simon the Pharisee in all of us.
bilingual.target: 我们很悲哀地看到,这种法利赛人西门般的情感常常出现在我们每个人中间.

bilingual.source: "Yes, I know all about that, " answered the patient sadly. "You see, I'm that man's tailor.
bilingual.target: “你说的那些我都知道，”这个病人悲哀地说：“你瞧，我就是那个裁缝。”

bilingual.source: To the end, and, and the word is out, all the persons complexion is very ugly, way there crying sadly.
bilingual.target: 敦和端赶到了，道也出来了，所有人的脸色都很难看，道在那里悲哀地哭泣着。
雅思敏伤心地回到了床上。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, I'm no longer associated with that project.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很遗憾，我已经被项目团队踢出来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, in order to restore things, the situation demands a blood sacrifice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可惜的是，为了让一切回到正轨，如今的境况需要一场鲜血的献祭。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, here's my question. Didn't you already do that? Flattering, but sadly, no.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想问个问题，你不是已经变成机器人了吗？虽然我受宠若惊，可惜还没有。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, Mr. Duncan did not survive and we continue to keep his family in our prayers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不幸的是，邓肯先生没有幸免我们仍然为他们的家人祈祷。

yingyinNormal.en: Listen to me. If you think sleeping with Ralph is going to get you my job. You are sadly mistaken.
yingyinNormal.zh: 听着，要是你以为跟罗夫上床就能坐上我的位子，你就错了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Harbin's great ice wall, not quite as long, 450 meters, and sadly, not as enduring, either.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是哈尔滨的冰长城，没那么长，只有450米，同样也不会那么持久。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, all this comes too late for the detective, who became something of a celebrity two years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可惜一切都迟了，这位大侦探，两年前刚扬名立万。

yingyinNormal.en: They also don't care for it if you stare at them and hyperventilate. Sadly, that's my home run swing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们也不关心，你是不是盯着她们呼吸加速，挺惨的，在我们家这就像是家族传统。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, he lost his perspective. He went mad. I haven't, as you well know. I have always seen things very clearly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很不幸，他丧失了远见，他疯了，我没有，你也清楚，我看事情一直非常清楚透彻。

yingyinNormal.en: I am afraid not. R2-D2 has been in low-power mode ever since Master Luke went away. Sadly, he may never be his old self again.
yingyinNormal.zh: 恐怕不能，卢克大师走了之后，R2-D2就一直处在低电量模式，他可能永远都醒不过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: The girls' recital was absolutely wonderful. They played Rachmaninoff. Everyone loved it, everyone except me, because, sadly, I was not there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 她们的独奏太精彩了。选了拉克曼尼诺夫的作品，所有人都说好，除了我，因为，不幸地，我不在场。

yingyinNormal.en: I was hoping you wouldn't notice. Irene was always a slave to a good bargain when it came to clothes, and sadly as it turned out, space heaters.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还希望你们不会注意到呢。艾琳总对打折的服饰毫无抵抗力，超短袖太冷，开暖气才一氧化碳中毒的。

yingyinNormal.en: Sadly, I find myself in a situation where I am no longer able to provide myself with the garments I need in order to be the best in my day-to-day life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很悲哀，我现在已经穷得没办法给自己买件可以日常穿的高档衣服。

yingyinNormal.en: In 1914, many people thought the war would be over by Christmas, but sadly by then the trenches were dug and the future shape of the war in Europe was set.
yingyinNormal.zh: 1914年，很多人认为战争会在圣诞节结束，然而不幸的是，战壕开挖，欧战的未来格局既定。

yingyinNormal.en: To date, we've seen three cases of Ebola diagnosed here, the man who contracted the disease in Liberia came here and sadly died, the two courageous nurses who were infected while they were treating him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到现在为止，在国内，我们被诊断为感染埃博拉疾病的只有3例，一个在利比里亚感染了病毒来到国内，以及在为他治疗时感染而不幸去世的两名勇敢的护士。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight>, all is not well with astronomy in Hawaii today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可悲的是，夏威夷现在的天文学不太妙。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight>, the spirit of inquiry once at home on campus has been replaced by the use of the humanities and social sciences as vehicles for publicizing "progressive," or left-liberal propaganda.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可悲的是，曾经在校园盛行的探究精神已被利用人文和社会科学作为“激进”或左翼自由主义的宣传工具的思想所取代。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 悲哀地；伤心地；难过地；不幸；遗憾的是；可惜；可悲地；令人遗憾地
v. 使悲伤；使伤心；使难过

word_family.mean: adj. 悲伤的；伤心的；难过的；显露悲伤的；老土的；守旧的；发得不好的

sense_info_list.en: in a way that is not satisfactory

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight>, most tourists never see the side of the Caribbean.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可悲的是，大多数游客从未见过加勒比海的另一面。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight>, the data also showed face-to-face socializing and sports activity had declined over the period covered by the survey.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗憾的是，数据还显示，面对面的社交和体育活动在调查期间有所下降。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 令人遗憾地; 可悲地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 悲哀地；伤心地；难过地；不幸；遗憾的是；可惜；可悲地；令人遗憾地

word_family.mean: adj. 悲伤的；伤心的；难过的；显露悲伤的；老土的；守旧的；发得不好的

examination_example.sentence: Hearing that, the little boy cried <highlight>sadly</highlight> and ran to his mother.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 听到这话，小男孩伤心地哭着跑向他的妈妈。

examination_example.sentence: Henry sat in his house <highlight>sadly</highlight> and did nothing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亨利伤心地坐在家里，什么也不做。

examination_example.sentence: After he looked for the bone for a short time, he lay down on the ground <highlight>sadly</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他找了一会儿骨头后，伤心地躺在地上。

sense_info_list.zh: 令人遗憾地; 可悲地

examination_example.sentence_trans: 但遗憾的是，村子里空无一人。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight> he died since his spaceship landed back on Earth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，在他的宇宙飞船返回地球后他去世了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Sadly</highlight>, Wonderland remained a dream when Rose died.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 遗憾的是，罗斯死后仙境仍只是个梦。
